name: Weird Dungeon Explorer: Run Away
description: You tried to fight the evil that you encountered in this gloomy dungeon, but it all went and went on you .. You decide to run ..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel celeron Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 480 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel core DUO Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon R7 265 Storage: 100 MB available space
